# uni-list-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                | Type                   | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `button`   | `button`   | Use an underling <button> element for actions Note: href will take precedence, remove href to use a button | `boolean`              | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable this item (only works with button type)                                                            | `boolean \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `href`     | `href`     | A url to pass to the underlying <a> tag Optional, will not use an anchor tag unless this is set            | `string \| undefined`  | `undefined` |
